info.name: WhatsApp - Large screen enhancements
info.description: Enhances the WhatsApp web layout for large screens. Features: • Makes WhatsApp web take all available viewport. • Allows the customization of the font sizes used. • Allows the setup of a custom chat background. Legend: 1. Min 48px / max 64px.
info.additionalInfo: 2018/03/28 Updated custom background selector to match the latest template. 2018/03/23 Fixed emoji size applying where it should not. 2018/03/09 Fixed system message font size overriding message font size. 2018/03/08 Fixed style not working, updated rules to match the new template and removed deprecated content.
